explains: adj. 白发的；浅色头发的；受宠爱的

sentences.en: Tom Canty lived to be a very old man, a handsome, white-haired old fellow, of grave and benignant aspect.
sentences.cn: 汤姆·康第很长寿，成为了一个英俊的白发老人，神情严肃而慈祥。

sentences.en: "Hey, aren't you from Mississippi?" the elegant, white-haired writer remembered being asked by the stranger.
sentences.cn: 这位优雅的白发作家记得有个陌生人问过他，“你不是从密西西比来的吗?”
白发农民露出缺齿的微笑。
